Nov. 30, 2013 D Wessex Brass Band Association Contest
Wessex BBA Contest 0 Own Choice Test Piece Contest Wessex Brass Band Association wessex-brass-band-association-contest
Life Centre, Bournemouth, Dorset, England, UK March contest:
1. Woodfalls 2. Michelmersh 3. Drybrook
Championship Section Results 1. Woodfalls
1st Section Results 1. Michelmersh 2. Otterbourne 3. Hyde 4. Sandhurst 5. Verwood 6. Shrewton
2nd Section Results 1. Ocean Brass 2. Drybrook
3rd Section Results 1. Andover 2. New Forest
4th Section Results 1. Corsham 2. Swindon
Best Percussion in all sections Michelmersh Silver
Best Trombones in all sections Michelmersh Silver
Best Musical Interpretation Michelmersh Silver
Best Bass Section Woodfalls
Best Cornet Otterbourne
Best Euphonium Woodfalls
Best Instrumentalist Eb Bass Woodfalls
Nov. 30, 2013, 11:07 p.m. Dec. 5, 2013, 3:58 p.m.
1 Woodfalls Band Phil Randell Of Distant Memories
